Master ARIS:
I have been waiting for You. I was told about You Queen Serenia. She said that soon will come Area who wants to release his power. She is very worried. Serene - Area only half, but she has a special magical power. Maybe she felt something unusual.
Yes, and remember something else. In the material world, few met Arta, and few people know about our powers. So You will be the center of attention. I will help You release the power, if only You will be able to act jointly with members of the Delegation. What? Are you ready?
